# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of 
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them.
### Errors when using inserter entities without source items
-  Ensure that the inserter entity has source items to work with.
### Errors when using furnace entities without ingredients
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to furnace entities before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine entities without connection
-  Ensure that the steam engine entity is connected to a power network.
### Errors when using electricity group entities without being plugged into electric network
-  Make sure to plug the electricity group entity into an electric network.
### Errors when using pipe group entities with empty or full output status
-  Ensure that the pipe group entity is properly connected and has a valid input/output.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
